definition.zh_def: 法蘭西斯科，一個常見的男性名字，源自拉丁語，意為「法國人」。
definition.en_def: Francisco is a common male given name of Spanish and Portuguese origin, meaning 'Frenchman'.
definition.example: Francisco loves to play soccer on the weekends.
